description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and summon a Powder Monkey.
flavorText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune
name: Monkey Idol
